txt.en:
'The trees on Tol Fennas are quite important. The wildlife that lives there relies on them for food and shelter. Their roots also keep the island from slipping into the waters during the more violent storms.

'The Corsairs that have settled there are cutting them down without care or concern. While I want to stop them from being able to build more ships, preserving the island is very important as well.

'Use a small boat in the harbor and head to the island. Once there, find some suitable locations and plant some seeds so we can begin growing a new crop of saplings.'
Dimlas is in Dol Amroth.\n\nDimlas will be pleased to hear a new crop of seeds has been planted.
The Corsairs are cutting down the trees on Tol Fennas in order to build more ships and boats.
'This is a start. We will have to be vigilant to ensure these ones are left to grow.'
Planting locations can be found all over Tol Fennas.\n\nDimlas asked you to go to Tol Fennas and plant seeds to grow new trees. A boat in the harbour of Dol Amroth can take you to Tol Fennas.
